name: Group Projects
author: Frederic Davidsen et al.
description: Work on different dataset to improve our skill and experience.

name: Personal Projects
author: Frederic Davidsen
description: This is a collection of my simple personal projects. I made them for fun and learning purposes.

name: Current Weather
author: Frederic Davidsen
description: Tells you what's the weather currently like. There is additional information about the weather, coordinates of the city, and wind condition.

name: Movies Search
author: Frederic Davidsen
description: Pulls out 10 movies on every search and check out the details of each movie. The details cover the plot, actors, director, and many others.

name: Company Profile
author: Frederic Davidsen
description: Simple design and light-weight webpage for a company profile. It helps your company to exhibit its achievement i.e. portfolio, clients.

name: Online Shop
author: Frederic Davidsen
description: Website to manage creation and modification of online shop's contents that support multiple admins. It helps an online shop to maintain its products while customers are easy to look for certain products there. Customers are unnecessary to sign in to give a like to certain products.

name: Covid-19 EDA
author: Frederic Davidsen et al.
description: Introduction to the 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) Data Repository by Johns Hopkins CSSE and explore it using some foundational packages in the Scientific Python Data Science stack.

name: Daily Horoscope
author: Frederic Davidsen
description: Daily horoscope of 12 Astrology Zodiac Signs with the addition of current week, month, and year.
